title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 29 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 29 2021
description:
EIB Guest Host Michael Berry, interviews Sen. Ted Cruz (R-TX) on the illegal flood across our southern border and how the late Sen. Harry Reid's cynical move to end the filibuster of judicial nominees backfired big time.


Michael Berry, continues his conversation with Dr. Peter A. McCullough on weighing the risks of vaccines for young people versus the risk of the virus itself.


Congressman Jim Jordan (R-OH) calls to hold Joe Biden and his regime responsible for doing "everything wrong,” as he pledges to investigate Fauci if the GOP takes back the House. 


Michael Berry, interviews David Pivtorak of the CRT Attorney Coalition about their latest lawsuit protecting children from hateful indoctrination.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
